name: Monk Simulator
description:
Monk Simulator is an experience-based game that puts its players in the shoes of one devoted to peace and harmony. Each day is exactly the same, and encourages players to follow through with the simple tasks presented to them. Loop through the endless everyday, and devote some time to yourself, your plants, and your beer.
